sentence.text: Here we show in a child with microthrombocytopenia, eosinophilia and inflammatory disease, a homozygous frameshift mutation in Arp2/3 complex-mediated actin nucleation (p.Val91Trpfs*30).

Thus loss of Arp2/3 complex-mediated actin nucleation produces a unique set of platelet abnormalities, and is associated with haematopoietic/immune symptoms affecting cell lineages where this isoform predominates.
